name: wireshark
description: Graphical network analyzer and capture tool

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: c-ares
dependencies.description: c-ares: A C library for asynchronous DNS requests

dependencies.name: doxygen
dependencies.description:
Doxygen is the de facto standard tool for generating documentation from
annotated C++ sources, but it also supports other popular programming
languages such as C, Objective-C, C#, PHP, Java, Python, IDL (Corba,
Microsoft, and UNO/OpenOffice flavors), Fortran, VHDL, Tcl, and to some
extent D..

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: git
dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.

dependencies.name: glib
dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependencies.name: gnutls
dependencies.description:
GnuTLS is a secure communications library implementing the SSL, TLS and
DTLS protocols and technologies around them. It provides a simple C
language application programming interface (API) to access the secure
communications protocols as well as APIs to parse and write X.509, PKCS
#12, OpenPGP and other required structures. It is aimed to be portable
and efficient with focus on security and interoperability.

dependencies.name: libgcrypt
dependencies.description: Cryptographic library based on the code from GnuPG.

dependencies.name: libmaxminddb
dependencies.description: C library for the MaxMind DB file format

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: libpcap
dependencies.description: libpcap is a portable library in C/C++ for packet capture.

dependencies.name: lua
dependencies.description: The Lua programming language interpreter and library.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: nghttp2
dependencies.description:
nghttp2 is an implementation of HTTP/2 and its header compression
algorithm HPACK in C.

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.
